page.title: 14BUILDINGS IN WARMINGTON
page.content: There are a number of different sorts of buildings in Warmington. The school has three classrooms, a kitchen, a hall a staff-room and store rooms. The classrooms have desks, chairs and cupboards. The club is a place where people can go to meet each other, have a drink or or play such games as darts, dominoes and skittles. The Red Lion is a Public House where people can meet each other and have a drink. People drink beer and wine and spirits. You can also have a bar-snack which is a light meal eaten in the bar. There is a Church and a Chapel where people can go to pray. The Village Hall was built about ten years ago. It can be hired by people for various occasions. Written by Michelle Daniel
